mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PLANNER (P_IDX, P_TITLE, P_START_DATE, P_END_DATE) VALUES (PLANNER_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{p_title}, #{p_start_date}, #{p_end_date})
INSERT INTO PLANNER_DETAIL (PD_IDX, PD_START_TIME, PD_END_TIME, PD_CONTENT, P_IDX) VALUES (PLANNER_D_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{pd_start_time}, #{pd_end_time}, #{pd_content}, #{p_idx})
